name: Dead Bytes
description:
Trapped, isolated, and far from modern society (to be perfectly honest, my introverted idea of heaven) I decided to develop a game. It was fun. I learned lots, made some cool music, did some fun voicelines, and made what is, in my opinion and that of my testers, a pretty fun little game. 

It's a retro-style, 2D zombie shooter, with a satisfying core gameplay loop and some fun upgrades. It's by no means a big game,  but it's a fun little one, which I guarantee will have you trying to beat your high score, and laughing/cringing at the turret's voice lines (don't ask, just play). 

Pay what you want if you wanna be my best friend and support a college student, or nothing at all if you're satan himself... or, y'know, just don't wanna pay (that's fine too). If you want to have a look at how the game developed, and see some more gameplay and features, you can check out my instagram @solo.gamedev .

Whether you get my game or not, I hope you have fun.

Enjoy playing! :)
